data.description:
Finally, a workout that doesn’t feel like work. Work out, box, meditate, and stretch in stunning locations around the world. Experience the unreal power of immersive fitness and see real results on your terms with our free 14-day trial.

Explore thousands of personalized workout recommendations with music from your favorite artists. From pop to rock to rap to classical, we’re constantly updating our music and workout libraries so you always have something new to move to. 

Develop a comprehensive fitness routine and strengthen different muscle groups with a range of full-body movement. Work the upper body with jabs, strikes, swings, and blocks. Target the lower body with lunges, squats, leg lifts, and quick footwork.

Stay inspired with our team of expert Coaches who help guide and motivate you through each exercise. And connect with other community members to share stories and bragging rights. 

Ready to try Supernatural?

Start our free 14-day trial today and cancel anytime. Available on Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, and Meta Quest Pro.

changelog.change_log:
Some members who are not on the latest Meta Quest OS are experiencing issues opening Supernatural.


Please ensure you're on the latest Meta Quest OS before opening the app. Here's how to ensure you're updated:

1 - Go to Settings from the main menu of your Quest

2 - Select "System Settings" from the Settings menu

3 - Select "Software Update" from the left hand side


In this latest release, in addition to our usual bug fixes and improvements we also have a new suite of UI sound effects to provide better auditory feedback, improve usability and amplify the immersive experience.


Need help, or have a suggestion? Reach out to us at support@getsupernatural.com

As of March 31, storing and managing health information (including specifically heart rate) will be covered by a new Consumer Health Data Privacy Policy. Users in the state of Washington who connect a heart rate tracker to the Supernatural mobile app will see a new prompt asking for your consent to collect, store, and process that information.

Some members who are not on the latest Meta Quest OS are experiencing issues opening Supernatural.

Please ensure you're on the latest Meta Quest OS before opening the app. Here's how to ensure you're updated:
1 - Go to Settings from the main menu of your Quest
2 - Select "System Settings" from the Settings menu
3 - Select "Software Update" from the left hand side

In this latest release, you'll find general bug fixes, stability improvements and tweaks : )

Need help, or have a suggestion? Reach out to us at support@getsupernatural.com
